entry.message:
[DQR.IFRS.0138.9840] The filing does not report either the element IncomeStatementAbstract or StatementOfComprehensiveIncomeAbstract in any presentation linkroles. According to ESMA filing rules this abstract item must be reported as the root element of a Income Statement or StatementOfComprehensiveIncomeAbstract appearing in the filing.
Rule Element Id:9840 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
